GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns a type of the ApiTable class.

GetRowsCount.name: GetRowsCount
GetRowsCount.description: Returns a number of rows in the current table.

GetRow.name: GetRow
GetRow.description: Returns a table row by its position in the table.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The row position within the table.

params.name: nRow
params.description: The row position in the current table where the specified cell is placed.

params.name: nCell
params.description: The cell position in the current table.

MergeCells.name: MergeCells
MergeCells.description: Merges an array of cells. If the merge is done successfully, it will return the resulting merged cell, otherwise the result will be "null". The number of cells in any row and the number of rows in the current table may be changed.

params.name: aCells
params.description: The array of cells to be merged.

SetStyle.name: SetStyle
SetStyle.description: Sets a style to the current table.

params.name: oStyle
params.description: The style which will be applied to the current table.

SetTableLook.name: SetTableLook
SetTableLook.description:
Specifies the conditional formatting components of the referenced table style (if one exists) which will be applied to the set of table rows with the current table-level property exceptions. A table style can specify up to six different optional conditional formats, for example, different formatting for the first column, which then can be applied or omitted from individual table rows in the parent table.

The default setting is to apply the row and column band formatting, but not the first row, last row, first column, or last column formatting.

params.name: isFirstColumn
params.description: Specifies that the first column conditional formatting will be applied to the table.

params.name: isFirstRow
params.description: Specifies that the first row conditional formatting will be applied to the table.

params.name: isLastColumn
params.description: Specifies that the last column conditional formatting will be applied to the table.

params.name: isLastRow
params.description: Specifies that the last row conditional formatting will be applied to the table.

params.name: isHorBand
params.description: Specifies that the horizontal band conditional formatting will not be applied to the table.

params.name: isVerBand
params.description: Specifies that the vertical band conditional formatting will not be applied to the table.

Split.name: Split
Split.description: Splits the cell into a given number of rows and columns.

params.name: oCell
params.description: The cell which will be split.

params.name: nRow
params.description: Count of rows into which the cell will be split.

params.name: nCol
params.description: Count of columns into which the cell will be split.

AddRow.name: AddRow
AddRow.description: Adds a new row to the current table.

params.name: oCell
params.description: The cell after which a new row will be added. If not specified, a new row will be added at the end of the table.

params.name: isBefore
params.description: Adds a new row before (false) or after (true) the specified cell. If no cell is specified, then this parameter will be ignored.

AddRows.name: AddRows
AddRows.description: Adds the new rows to the current table.

params.name: oCell
params.description: The cell after which the new rows will be added. If not specified, the new rows will be added at the end of the table.

params.name: nCount
params.description: Count of rows to be added.

params.name: isBefore
params.description: Adds the new rows before (false) or after (true) the specified cell. If no cell is specified, then this parameter will be ignored.

AddColumn.name: AddColumn
AddColumn.description: Adds a new column to the current table.

params.name: oCell
params.description: The cell after which a new column will be added. If not specified, a new column will be added at the end of the table.

params.name: isBefore
params.description: Adds a new column before (false) or after (true) the specified cell. If no cell is specified, then this parameter will be ignored.

AddColumns.name: AddColumns
AddColumns.description: Adds the new columns to the current table.

params.name: oCell
params.description: The cell after which the new columns will be added. If not specified, the new columns will be added at the end of the table.

params.name: nCount
params.description: Count of columns to be added.

params.name: isBefore
params.description: Adds the new columns before (false) or after (true) the specified cell. If no cell is specified, then this parameter will be ignored.

AddElement.name: AddElement
AddElement.description: Adds a paragraph or a table or a blockLvl content control using its position in the cell.

params.name: oCell
params.description: The cell where the specified element will be added.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position in the cell where the specified element will be added.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The document element which will be added at the current position.

RemoveRow.name: RemoveRow
RemoveRow.description: Removes a table row with a specified cell.

params.name: oCell
params.description: The cell which is placed in the row that will be removed.

RemoveColumn.name: RemoveColumn
RemoveColumn.description: Removes a table column with a specified cell.

params.name: oCell
params.description: The cell which is placed in the column that will be removed.

Copy.name: Copy
Copy.description: Creates a copy of the current table.

GetRange.name: GetRange
GetRange.description: Returns a Range object that represents the part of the document contained in the specified table.

params.name: Start
params.description: Start character in the current element.

params.name: End
params.description: End character in the current element.

SetHAlign.name: SetHAlign
SetHAlign.description: Sets the horizontal alignment to the table.

params.name: sType
params.description: Horizontal alignment type: may be "left" or "center" or "right".

SetVAlign.name: SetVAlign
SetVAlign.description: Sets the vertical alignment to the table.

params.name: sType
params.description: Vertical alignment type: may be "top" or "center" or "bottom".

SetPaddings.name: SetPaddings
SetPaddings.description: Sets the table paddings. If table is inline, then only left padding is applied.

params.name: nLeft
params.description: Left padding.

params.name: nTop
params.description: Top padding.

params.name: nRight
params.description: Right padding.

params.name: nBottom
params.description: Bottom padding.

params.name: isFlow
params.description: Specifies if the table is inline or not.

GetParentContentControl.name: GetParentContentControl
GetParentContentControl.description: Returns a content control that contains the current table.

InsertInContentControl.name: InsertInContentControl
InsertInContentControl.description: Wraps the current table object with a content control.

params.name: nType
params.description: Defines if this method returns the ApiBlockLvlSdt (nType === 1) or ApiTable (any value except 1) object.

GetParentTable.name: GetParentTable
GetParentTable.description: Returns a table that contains the current table.

GetTables.name: GetTables
GetTables.description: Returns the tables that contain the current table.

GetParentTableCell.name: GetParentTableCell
GetParentTableCell.description: Returns a table cell that contains the current table.

Search.name: Search
Search.description: Searches for a scope of a table object. The search results are a collection of ApiRange objects.

params.name: sText
params.description: Search string.

params.name: isMatchCase
params.description: Case sensitive or not.

SetTextPr.name: SetTextPr
SetTextPr.description: Applies the text settings to the entire contents of the table.

params.name: oTextPr
params.description: The text properties that will be set to the current table.

SetBackgroundColor.name: SetBackgroundColor
SetBackgroundColor.description: Sets the background color to all cells in the current table.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

params.name: bNone
params.description: Defines that background color will not be set.

ToJSON.name: ToJSON
ToJSON.description: Converts the ApiTable object into the JSON object.

params.name: bWriteNumberings
params.description: Specifies if the used numberings will be written to the JSON object or not.

params.name: bWriteStyles
params.description: Specifies if the used styles will be written to the JSON object or not.

GetPosInParent.name: GetPosInParent
GetPosInParent.description: Returns the table position within its parent element.

ReplaceByElement.name: ReplaceByElement
ReplaceByElement.description: Replaces the current table with a new element.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The element to replace the current table with.

AddComment.name: AddComment
AddComment.description: Adds a comment to all contents of the current table. Please note that this table must be in the document.

params.name: sText
params.description: The comment text (required).

params.name: sAuthor
params.description: The author's name (optional).

AddCaption.name: AddCaption
AddCaption.description: Adds a caption paragraph after (or before) the current table. Please note that the current table must be in the document (not in the footer/header). And if the current table is placed in a shape, then a caption is added after (or before) the parent shape.

params.name: sAdditional
params.description: The additional text.

params.name: sLabel
params.description: The caption label.

params.name: bExludeLabel
params.description: Specifies whether to exclude the label from the caption.

params.name: sNumberingFormat
params.description: The possible caption numbering format.

params.name: bBefore
params.description: Specifies whether to insert the caption before the current table (true) or after (false) (after/before the shape if it is placed in the shape).

params.name: nHeadingLvl
params.description: The heading level (used if you want to specify the chapter number). If you want to specify "Heading 1", then nHeadingLvl === 0 and etc.

params.name: sCaptionSep
params.description: The caption separator (used if you want to specify the chapter number).

SetStyleColBandSize.name: SetStyleColBandSize
SetStyleColBandSize.description: Specifies a number of columns which will comprise each table column band for this table style.

params.name: nCount
params.description: The number of columns measured in positive integers.

SetStyleRowBandSize.name: SetStyleRowBandSize
SetStyleRowBandSize.description: Specifies a number of rows which will comprise each table row band for this table style.

params.name: nCount
params.description: The number of rows measured in positive integers.

SetJc.name: SetJc
SetJc.description: Specifies the alignment of the current table with respect to the text margins in the current section.

params.name: sJcType
params.description: The alignment type used for the current table placement.

SetShd.name: SetShd
SetShd.description: Specifies the shading which is applied to the extents of the current table.

params.name: sType
params.description: The shading type applied to the extents of the current table.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

params.name: isAuto
params.description: The true value disables the SetShd method use.

SetTableBorderTop.name: SetTableBorderTop
SetTableBorderTop.description: Sets the border which will be displayed at the top of the current table.

params.name: sType
params.description: The top border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current top border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the top part of the table measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetTableBorderBottom.name: SetTableBorderBottom
SetTableBorderBottom.description: Sets the border which will be displayed at the bottom of the current table.

params.name: sType
params.description: The bottom border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current bottom border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the bottom part of the table measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetTableBorderLeft.name: SetTableBorderLeft
SetTableBorderLeft.description: Sets the border which will be displayed on the left of the current table.

params.name: sType
params.description: The left border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current left border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the left part of the table measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetTableBorderRight.name: SetTableBorderRight
SetTableBorderRight.description: Sets the border which will be displayed on the right of the current table.

params.name: sType
params.description: The right border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current right border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the right part of the table measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetTableBorderInsideH.name: SetTableBorderInsideH
SetTableBorderInsideH.description: Specifies the border which will be displayed on all horizontal table cell borders which are not on the outmost edge of the parent table (all horizontal borders which are not the topmost or bottommost borders).

params.name: sType
params.description: The horizontal table cell border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the horizontal table cells of the table measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetTableBorderInsideV.name: SetTableBorderInsideV
SetTableBorderInsideV.description: Specifies the border which will be displayed on all vertical table cell borders which are not on the outmost edge of the parent table (all vertical borders which are not the leftmost or rightmost borders).

params.name: sType
params.description: The vertical table cell border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the vertical table cells of the table measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetTableCellMarginBottom.name: SetTableCellMarginBottom
SetTableCellMarginBottom.description: Specifies an amount of space which will be left between the bottom extent of the cell contents and the border of all table cells within the parent table (or table row).

params.name: nValue
params.description: The value for the amount of space below the bottom extent of the cell measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetTableCellMarginLeft.name: SetTableCellMarginLeft
SetTableCellMarginLeft.description: Specifies an amount of space which will be left between the left extent of the cell contents and the left border of all table cells within the parent table (or table row).

params.name: nValue
params.description: The value for the amount of space to the left extent of the cell measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetTableCellMarginRight.name: SetTableCellMarginRight
SetTableCellMarginRight.description: Specifies an amount of space which will be left between the right extent of the cell contents and the right border of all table cells within the parent table (or table row).

params.name: nValue
params.description: The value for the amount of space to the right extent of the cell measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetTableCellMarginTop.name: SetTableCellMarginTop
SetTableCellMarginTop.description: Specifies an amount of space which will be left between the top extent of the cell contents and the top border of all table cells within the parent table (or table row).

params.name: nValue
params.description: The value for the amount of space above the top extent of the cell measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetCellSpacing.name: SetCellSpacing
SetCellSpacing.description: Specifies the default table cell spacing (the spacing between adjacent cells and the edges of the table).

params.name: nValue
params.description: Spacing value measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch). "Null" means that no spacing will be applied.

SetTableInd.name: SetTableInd
SetTableInd.description: Specifies the indentation which will be added before the leading edge of the current table in the document (the left edge in the left-to-right table, and the right edge in the right-to-left table).

params.name: nValue
params.description: The indentation value measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetWidth.name: SetWidth
SetWidth.description: Sets the preferred width to the current table. Tables are created with the {@link ApiTable#SetWidth} method properties set by default, which always override the {@link ApiTablePr#SetWidth} method properties. That is why there is no use to try and apply {@link ApiTablePr#SetWidth}. We recommend you to use the {@link ApiTablePr#SetWidth} method instead.

params.name: sType
params.description: Type of the width value from one of the available width values types.

params.name: nValue
params.description: The table width value measured in positive integers.

SetTableLayout.name: SetTableLayout
SetTableLayout.description: Specifies the algorithm which will be used to lay out the contents of the current table within the document.

params.name: sType
params.description: The type of the table layout in the document.

params.name: sTitle
params.description: The table title to be set.

params.name: sDescr
params.description: The table description to be set.
